Class RoomDBConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • suncertify.util.RoomDBConnector

  • public class RoomDBConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    William Brosnan This class will be used to create a connection to the database when run in standalone mode, using this class will result in a direct connection to the database
